title: Chapter 275 - 260: Sister
body:
Chapter 275 - 260: Sister

Chapter 275: Chapter 260: Sister

Translator: 549690339

Kevin Clark spoke more casually with them, since they were of the same generation.

And the effect of this sentence was quite significant.

Both families instantly fell into a pondering state.

Seeing the effect, Robinson Scott almost clapped for Kevin Clark.

Robinson kept thinking: Brother Nine got a good marriage, Brother Nine knows how to control his husband, Brother Nine is so domineering.

No one spoke in the living room, and Daisy Zane calmly said: “I think Third

Master Clark makes sense.”

Everyone looked at Daisy Zane, who originally thought that Kevin Clark was right, but now they felt it even more reasonable after hearing her push.

Kevin Clark also looked at her, for the first time feeling so wonderful to be echoed.

And the way these two echo each other...

Is this...husband and wife?

Daisy Zane glanced at their eyes, then picked up the tea and took a sip.

With just a casual glance, everyone came back to their senses and looked away.

Adam Scott coughed lightly and said: “Hmm...what Third Master and Nana said makes sense. In-laws, what do you think?”

Pete Baker coughed again, if it weren’t for the presence of outsiders, he really wanted to curse him shameless.

Robinson Scott: If it makes sense, then don’t call them in-laws.

She was silently praying in her heart for him to leave quickly.

However, the prayer didn’t work. On the contrary, it had a counter-effect, causing Hugo Clark to suddenly speak.

His calm, even somewhat experienced tone, suddenly startled Olivia Lane.

“Why are you running out so late?”

Olivia Lane pursed her lips and didn’t answer him.

Hugo Clark looked at her and continued: “Won’t you be sleepy in class tomorrow if you go out so late?”

Olivia Lane still didn’t speak.

Daisy Zane glanced at Hugo Clark, thinking that he seemed to have been sent by William Lane.

And Kevin Clark also glanced at him, that glance seemed to be cursing him. How could their family have such a fool.

Didn’t they have anything else to say when they finally met?

However, Hugo Clark continued: “Didn’t you promise your brother that you would study hard this year?”

Kevin Clark:

“When do you graduate with this attitude toward learning?”

Olivia Lane was annoyed with his questions and looked at him, saying, “Can

you stop asking already! Graduation is next year anyway, there is no hurry. Why are you all so annoying? I’m not a child anymore, and a bunch of people are watching me.”

Hugo Clark stopped walking and looked at her. Seeing her angry appearance, he suddenly swallowed and didn’t dare to say anything.

Or rather...suddenly, he didn’t know what to say anymore.

Kevin Clark and Daisy Zane also stopped walking and looked at them..
